page.title: 09EDUCATION
page.content: {Pre-school:}Playgroups in Morebattle and Ancrum run by parents committees. Nursery in Jedburgh run by state. Ages 3-5yr. Own transport. {Primary:}Ages 5-12 attend State Schools in Morebattle, Kelso(Edenside) and Jedburgh(Parkside). Since school in Crailing closed in 1985 and Eckford in 1962 Crailing is in the catchment area for Jedburgh and Eckford for Morebattle. Some attend Kelso because Parents Charter 1982 gave parents right to choose. Free transport. {Secondary:}Ages 12-18yr attend Kelso High or Jedburgh Grammar. Children may leave at 16 after S.C.E. O'grade examinations or stay to study S.C.E. Higher Grade. Free transport. Three terms.Mid Aug to Christmas(1week holiday in Oct).Jan to Easter(2 week holiday).Easter to July.
